modName: Eola Transforms Into A Flame Atronach
summary: This mod turns Eola into a Flame Atronach whenever she enters a battle, and obviously she returns to normal Eola form whenever a battle is over.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oF1Uq.png[/IMG][/center]

This mod turns Eola into a Flame Atronach whenever she enters a battle, and obviously she returns to normal Eola form whenever a battle is over.

I created my first mod  \"Temptress Vixen Transforms Into A Flame Atronach\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20819/ and had a request to have Eola to do the same. So here it is.

Added two versions of Eola.

The first has a Flame Explosion transformation effect, but it was a frame rate killer for me. Maybe it will be different for you.

The second is with the original Red Smoke, like the Temptress version, to save frame rates.

Check out the video here: \"Temptress Vixen Transforms Into A Flame Atronach\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20819/ to see the Red Smoke transformation effect. Or check the video tab of this mod.

The Flame Explosion is all visual, it causes no damage. I did that because some of your others followers might get mad if they catch fire every time Eola is in a fighting mood.

[center][youtube]tnhioFSD0i4[/youtube][/center]

To install, extract the file contents to your data folder, although the NMM should work. Let me know if it doesn\'t.

If you want to change between the transformation effect versions to test them out you must do a CLEAN save.

CLEAN SAVE! CLEAN SAVE! CLEAN SAVE!

Not a Quick Save.

Create a new save.
Uninstall the mod.
Start the game and make a SECOND new save. Quit game.
Add the version you want (Red Smoke or Flame Explosion) and rock on!

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1XUSq.png[/IMG][/center]

Any weapons that you give her, she will drag it at her feet in  Flame Atronach form.  She doesn\'t need any weapons anyway since she transforms into a  Flame Atronach.

The Flame Atronach has no stagger animations, so when Eola gets to zero hit points, she will just stand there in Flame Atronach form doing nothing. So if you are wondering why she is just standing there not doing anything, it\'s because she is trying to recover health.

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3l2MX.png[/IMG][/center]

Tytanis for saving me at the last minute in a Nexus chat session.

The Nexus. I\'m a Premium member for a reason! This is a great place with great people!

Average Porcupine on the Bethesda forum for helping me with the transformation effect. What a lifesaver!

Bethesda. ?? Mullon!
